title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Cotton Pique Polo Shirt (Available in Big & Tall)
description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
COTTON PIQUE: 100% Cotton Pique offers a soft hand feel with natural stretch and breathability. Tightly knit for durability and comfort.

PIQUE POLO STYLING: Wear this short sleeve polo year-round. Lightweight and breathable on its own for the summer or layered with a sweatshirt on those cooler days, this polo perfectly pairs with chinos, shorts and jeans.
DETAILS: Flat knit rib trim at collar and sleeve opening. Two button placket and straight bottom hem with side vents for comfortable movement.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
